title: Berger reunited with Honda F1 V12 engine 33 years on
summary: More than 30 years after his podium at Estoril, Berger has been reunited with the very Honda V12 engine that powered his McLaren

qa_pairs.question: Which team did Gerhard Berger drive for when he used the Honda V12 engine?
In which year did Gerhard Berger achieve a podium finish at the Estoril race?
What type of engine is the Honda V12 that Berger was reunited with?
